ratings.comment: This woman should not be in charge of anything. She is a horrible person, is rude and outwardly mean, and is not caring or considerate of anyone. Do not interact with her. STEER CLEAR!!

Lectures DRAG. Two hours is two hours too long for this class. Very unstructured discussions where students lead, except we all agree on everything we say so there's no progress. Teaches us like we're in elementary school, practicing citations and peer review every assignment. Rubrics are unspecific so you never know what ur doing for assignments
